weapon.name: Mini Hurricane
weapon.description: Far too dangerous to be a child's plaything. There is no way a kid could have gotten their hands on it through honest means. Who knows what kind of tech was used to refit it... Maybe it was simply picked up somewhere off the beaten path.

weaponEffects.title: Physical Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase physical ATK by **15%** and physical resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more physical weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

weaponEffects.title: Universal Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase final damage by **15%**. Activate by equipping **2** weapons of the same element, not including physical. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.

normals.name: Speedy Blow
normals.description:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch **5** consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **60.4%** of ATK plus **362** and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **70.9%** of ATK plus **425** and knock the target back. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **58.8%** of ATK plus **353** and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **160.4%** of ATK plus **962** and continuously knocking the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **172.9%** of ATK plus **1037** and launch the target.

normals.name: Whirling Blow
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch **5** attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **72.1%** of ATK plus **433**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **60.3%** of ATK plus **362**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **55.4%** of ATK plus **332**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **100.7%** of ATK plus **604**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **134.7%** of ATK plus **808**.

normals.name: Frantic Digging
normals.description:
When on the ground, tap and hold normal attack for the first to third normal attack to trigger Frantic Digging.
Continuously attack forward in place while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage to nearby targets equal to **29.4%** of ATK plus **176** and causes the target to become **grievous**, lasting **7** seconds.

normals.name: Boiling Octopus Balls
normals.description:
During Frantic Digging, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Boiling Octopus Balls.
Continuously attack forward while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to **29.4%** of ATK plus **176** to nearby targets. Once normal attack is released, deal damage equal to **44.1%** of ATK plus **265** to nearby targets and cause them to become **grievous** for **7** seconds.
Use the directional controls to move during Boiling Octopus Balls.

normals.name: Go on, Pip!
normals.description:
When on the ground, tap and hold normal attack or hold during the fourth normal attack to trigger Go on, Pip!
Continuously move forward while attacking and consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to **29.4%** of ATK plus **176** to nearby targets, knocking the target back and causing them to become **grievous**, lasting for **7** seconds.
Use the directional controls to move during Go on, Pip!

normals.name: Waterspout Spike
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Waterspout Spike.
Fall from above, dealing damage equal to **167.2%** of ATK plus **1003** to nearby targets upon reaching the ground, and launching them.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

dodge.name: Tentacle Counter
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Tentacle Counter, dealing damage to nearby targets equal to **37.8%** of ATK plus **227**.
**Passive**: Delay targets by **60%**, and deal damage equal to **18%** of ATK per second, lasting **5** seconds. This effect can only be triggered **1** time every **10** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

dodge.name: Pursuing Tentacle
dodge.description: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Pursuing Tentacle, dealing damage equal to **106.3%** of ATK plus **638** to nearby targets.

skill.name: Exploration Team Strike
skill.description:
Enter a charging state and become temporarily invincible (unavailable in Apex League). Draw in nearby targets, dealing damage to them equal to **29.4%** of ATK plus **176** each time an attack lands. Cooldown: **20** seconds (cooldown starts upon entering charging state).
Upon releasing, detonate all **Treasure Tracers** on nearby targets and cause **Octowhip** to enter a Rampage state, increasing the speed of coordinated attacks by **100%**, lasting for **12** seconds.

Different release timings can be chosen depending on the number of **Minisquids** above the Wanderer.
**Total Berserk**: When the number of **Minisquids** equals **2**, release to deal damage to nearby targets equal to **588%** of ATK plus **3528**.
**Partial Berserk**: When the number of **Minisquids** is **1** or **3**, release to deal damage to nearby targets equal to **411.6%** of ATK plus **2469**.

**Prowling Clones**: Gain **15** **Octowhips** when in combat, which attack locked-on targets, dealing damage equal to **115%** of ATK and consuming **1** Octowhip each time an attack lands. A maximum of **30** Octowhips can be stored at a time.
**Pip Octowhip** Place **1** **Treasure Tracer** on targets each time they are hit by an Octowhip which lasts for **20** seconds, for a maximum of **3** stacks.
Detonate **1** **Treasure Tracer** stack whenever physical damage aside from **Octowhip** is dealt to a target, dealing damage equal to **20%** of ATK. This effect can only be triggered **1** time every **0.1** seconds.
Gain **1** Octowhip whenever a discharge skill from any weapon hits a target. This effect can only be triggered **1** time every **0.1** seconds.

discharge.name: Pip Ultimate
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and briefly submerge the Wanderer, dealing damage to nearby targets equal to **265.2%** of ATK +**1591** upon emerging. Upon landing, deal damage to nearby targets equal to **618.8%** of ATK + **3712**, and gain the maximum number of **Pip Octowhip**. When the skill is active, gain damage immunity for **1.5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.description:
Increase the shatter of Frantic Digging, Boiling Octopus Balls, and Go on, Pip! by **80%**.
Gain a **50%** increase to Shield when these skills are used when the Wanderer's Shield is below **50%**. Lasts **8** seconds. This effect can only be triggered **1** time every **5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

**Pip Octowhip** limit is increased to **45**.
After using Pip Ultimate, increase physical damage by **12%** for **30** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

Detonating **Treasure Tracers** refreshes the **grievous** status of targets.
Increase physical damage by **10%** when damage is dealt to targets with less than **80%** HP. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.
Increase damage dealt by detonating **Treasure Tracers** to **90%** of ATK.

matrice.name: Gnonno
matrice.description: Tragedy is born from impulsive, risky decisions.

set.set_2: Increase all elemental damage by **8%**/**9%**/**10%**/**11%** when at least **1** physical weapon is equipped. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.set_4: After using any physical weapon skill or discharge skill, increase all elemental damage by **13%**/**16%**/**19%**/**22%** for **25** seconds. Endurance consumed when using **Mini Hurricane** is reduced by **40%**. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
